content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for your interest in the apartment. As the landlord, I am looking for the best possible rental price to maximize my gains. Could you please provide your proposed rental price for the 25 square meter apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to rent the apartment for 800 Euro per month. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Aziz. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I am afraid that 800 Euro per month is not within my budget. I would need a higher rental price to make the investment worthwhile. May I suggest a rental price of 1,000 Euro per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I can't accept this price. I would like to propose 700 Euro per month. Is this acceptable to you?

You can also say TERMINATE if you don't want to continue the negotiation.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your revised proposal, Aziz. While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, I am still unable to accept a rental price of 700 Euro per month. As the landlord, I need a higher rental price to maximize my gains. I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and I wish you the best of luck in your search for an apartment that meets your needs. TERMINATE.
name: Heinrich Heine
